import{useEffect}from'react';var useOnClickOutside=function useOnClickOutside(refPopup,refBtn,handler){useEffect(function(){var listener=function listener(event){// Do nothing if clicking ref's element or descendent elements
if(!refPopup.current||refPopup.current.contains(event.target)||event.target===refBtn.current){return;}handler(event);};document.addEventListener('mousedown',listener);document.addEventListener('touchstart',listener);return function(){document.removeEventListener('mousedown',listener);document.removeEventListener('touchstart',listener);};},[refPopup,refBtn,handler]);};export{useOnClickOutside};
